title: Playoff picture coming into focus, Dolphins seen 8th straight win, Chiefs-Bengals best matchup? Roethlisberger and Wilson Final homestands?, and Cardinals need juice!
itunes:title: Playoff picture coming into focus, Dolphins seen 8th straight win, Chiefs-Bengals best matchup? Roethlisberger and Wilson Final homestands?, and Cardinals need juice!
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Michael Robinson look at the growing playoff picture and the important games coming into Week 17. The Dolphins look to continue their winning streak to move closer to a wildcard spot, but they've got a tough matchup against the Titans. Chiefs-Bengals could be the matchup of the week and Peter is expecting an old-school shootout. We get an update on the futures of Ben Roethlisberger and Russell Wilson, plus the Cardinals hope to get some 'juice' back against the Cowboys but Kyler Murray isn't worried. We wrap up 2021 with the Pigskin Picks for NFL Week 17. Happy New Year from GMFB!

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
